full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 745 Filed 08/10/22 Page 227 of 264 638 LC1VMAX7 Matt - direct 1 have a witness here who's just going to testify about everything he knew about her because he was in a relationship with her and -- 4 THE COURT: No, I won't allow everything that he knew about her. I will allow issues that you specifically spent time on cross-examination. 7 MS. STERNHEIM: Okay. 8 THE COURT: Attacking her credibility. 9 (Continued on next page) 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012247
